definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the Puritans , or to their doctrines and practice.
Precise in observance of legal or religious requirements; strict ; overscrupulous ; rigid (often used by way of reproach or contempt).

main_definition: Of or pertaining to the Puritans , or to their doctrines and practice.
secondary_definitions: Precise in observance of legal or religious requirements; strict ; overscrupulous ; rigid (often used by way of reproach or contempt).
